//=======================================================

function	script	BaseShop	{
switch(select("道具商店","新手商店","杜蘭族商店","武器商店","防具商店","三轉道具","四轉物品","寵物用品","販賣")){
case 1:
switch(select("恢復道具","輔助道具","鍛造工具","煉金器具","料理材料","製造書籍")){
case 1:callshop	"道具商店",1;end;
case 2:callshop "輔助道具",1;end;
case 3:callshop	"鍛造商店",1;end;
case 4:callshop	"煉金商店",1;end;
case 5:callshop	"料理商店",1;end;
case 6:callshop	"製造書店",1;end;
}
case 2:
switch(select("新手武器:新手防具:新手影裝:販賣")){
case 1:callshop	"新手武器",1;end;
case 2:callshop	"新手裝備",1;end;
case 3:callshop	"新手影裝",1;end;
}
case 3:
switch(select("杜蘭族商店")){
case 1:callshop	"杜蘭族商店",1;end;
}
case 4:
switch(select("長劍商店","短劍商店","拳刃商店","斧頭商店","矛戟商店","鈍器商店","法杖商店","弓箭商店","拳套商店","樂器商店","鞭子商店","槍械商店","忍具商店")){
case 1:callshop	"長劍商店",1;end;
case 2:callshop	"短劍商店",1;end;
case 3:callshop	"拳刃商店",1;end;
case 4:callshop	"斧頭商店",1;end;
case 5:callshop	"矛戟商店",1;end;
case 6:callshop	"鈍器商店",1;end;
case 7:callshop	"法杖商店",1;end;
case 8:callshop	"弓箭商店",1;end;
case 9:callshop	"拳套商店",1;end;
case 10:callshop	"樂器商店",1;end;
case 11:callshop	"鞭子商店",1;end;
case 12:callshop	"槍械商店",1;end;
case 13:callshop	"忍具商店",1;end;
}
case 5:
switch(select("鎧甲商店","盾牌商店","鞋子商店","披肩商店")){
case 1:callshop	"鎧甲商店",1;end;
case 2:callshop	"盾牌商店",1;end;
case 3:callshop	"鞋子商店",1;end;
case 4:callshop	"披肩商店",1;end;
}
case 6:
switch(select("盧恩騎士","十字斬首","基因學者","詩人舞者","機械工匠","咒術師","大主教","遊俠","魅影","妖術師")){
case 1:callshop	"盧恩騎士",1;end;
case 2:callshop	"十字斬首",1;end;
case 3:callshop	"基因學者",1;end;
case 4:callshop	"詩人舞者",1;end;
case 5:callshop	"機械工匠",1;end;
case 6:callshop	"咒術師",1;end;
case 7:callshop	"大主教",1;end;
case 8:callshop	"遊俠",1;end;
case 9:callshop	"魅影",1;end;
case 10:callshop	"妖術師",1;end;
}
case 7:callshop	"四轉商店",1;end;

case 8:
switch(select("寵物飼料","抓寵道具","寵物裝備")){
case 1:callshop	"寵物用品",1;end;
case 2:callshop	"抓寵用品",1;end;
case 3:callshop	"寵物裝備",1;end;
}
case 9:callshop	"道具商店",2;end;
	}
end;
}

uttycty,95,106,5	script	道具商人	513,{
	disable_items;
	callfunc("BaseShop");
	end;
Oninit:
OnTimer2000:
showscript "★ 道具商人 ★ ";
initnpctimer;
	setnpcicon getnpcid(0),22,"道具商人";
	end;
}
